execution_quality: Agent presented initial design which was accepted in principle but required architectural refinements. User provided specific guidance on transaction structure and terminology.
work_category: User proposing an architectural design for data synchronization, then receiving feedback requesting Datomic-inspired refinements and naming clarifications.
summary: Agent proposed a sync structure that was substantially accepted but required architectural refinement. User provided Datomic-inspired corrections: shift to transaction-based structure with shared updatedAt and consideration of brief naming ('op' vs 'operation'). Design iteration is progressing constructively.
follow_up_pattern: User is refining the architecture through iterative discussion, suggesting the design is moving in the right direction with specific adjustments needed.
